meanings.sent1: The businesspeople in the office were busy discussing the new project.
meanings.sent2: Many businesspeople attended the conference to network and learn.
meanings.sent3: The businesspeople decided to have a pizza party to celebrate a successful quarter.
meanings.sent4: In the world of commerce, businesspeople are the architects of economic growth.
meanings.sent5: The bustling city street was filled with businesspeople in suits and briefcases.

meanings.definition: A group of individuals involved in commercial or industrial activities.
meanings.sent1: The businesspeople gathered at the trade show to showcase their products.
meanings.sent2: Local businesspeople often meet for breakfast to discuss community initiatives.
meanings.sent3: The businesspeople at the factory had a friendly competition to see who could pack the most boxes.
meanings.sent4: The businesspeople in the market were like busy bees, each contributing to the overall buzz of activity.
meanings.sent5: The businesspeople on the board of directors made strategic decisions to steer the company towards success.
